summary: This document is an email communication from Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, discussing a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein to set up a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team managing his accounts. The email indicates the meeting is to be scheduled for the week of October 8 when Epstein returns to New York City.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team managing his accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the email, coordinating the meeting request on behalf of Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as a member of the Deutsche Bank team who will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as the person who informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's meeting request.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is a client of Deutsche Bank, and Amanda Kirby is the associate managing his account.
Jeffrey Epstein is seeking to meet with Paul, who is part of the Deutsche Bank team managing his accounts.
Amanda Kirby and Harry are colleagues at Deutsche Bank, with Harry providing information about Epstein's request.

events.title: Meeting Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team for the week of October 8.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, US 10154-0004
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team managing his accounts.
Amanda Kirby is the associate at Deutsche Bank coordinating the meeting.
The meeting is to be scheduled for the week of October 8 when Epstein returns to NYC.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request.
